content:
{"name": "Food For All DC", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Screening with a social worker or case manager must be completed.

- Eligible people are:
	- Seniors with difficulty in moving
	- Single mothers with infants or babies
	- People with mental health issues that prevent them from going out
	- People with medical conditions that prevent them from going out
	- People with disability

- Delivery can be done on Thursdays, Fridays, and Saturday mornings but a request can be made anytime by calling 202-489-8676. Leave a voice message with your details.", "email": "", "url": "https://foodforalldc.org/contact/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1810 16th St NW", "address_2": null, "city": "Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20009", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.914348, "longitude": -77.036882}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 489-8676", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "An eligibility assessment is completed by a caseworker."}]}
